1576026161_17ZnSRGrALWLigjaDhkzUM4KAC8c8.body: This is also my question, we (Iranians) are on the verge of being caged in IR regime Intranet and I have no idea how can decentralized platforms such as Zeronet be useful to us while we have no way of hiding our ip.
Also one of the users made a comparison between the censorship in china, while the current Intranet model that Iranian regime is implementing can only be compared with Kwangmyong (north-korea).
